author: Romain Racamier-Lafon <romain.racamier@gmail.com>
description: personal heavily opinionated script I make to enhance my daily web experience
name: @shuunen/user-scripts

scripts.check: pnpm lint && pnpm lint:master && pnpm lint:gh-content && repo-check && pnpm test && echo check success
scripts.lint:gh-content: echo These files should not use githubusercontent directly : && grep -R githubusercontent src; if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then echo lint:gh-content success; else echo Migrate to https://www.jsdelivr.com/github && exit 1; fi
scripts.lint:master: echo These files should not use user-scripts/src directly : && grep -R user-scripts/src src; if [ $? -eq 1 ]; then echo lint:master success; else echo Use this instead : https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/Shuunen/user-scripts@master/src/utils.js && exit 1; fi
